thread.title: lastminute.com: Best deals on London hotels this summer
thread.title_full: lastminute.com: Best deals on London hotels this summer - Mirror Online

author: by Mirror.co.uk
title: lastminute.com: Best deals on London hotels this summer
text:
Here at lastminute.com , we know hotels, and we aim to bring you the best price on a last minute booking.
From modern apartments and traditional guesthouses to well-known brands and boutique accommodations; we’ve got a great choice of places to stay.
If you’re looking to save a bit of money on your holiday, check out our selection of cheap rooms, or if you want to celebrate in style, take a look at our 5-star luxury hotels .
You could even treat yourself to some pampering on one of our spa breaks.
Top Secret Hotels
Get rooms for up to 35% less than anywhere else when you book a Top Secret Hotel with us.
Choose from our fantastic range of hotels and know everything about the hotel before you book, except the hotel name.
We work with leading hotels around the world to get you the very best deals but the offers are exclusive so we keep hotel names Top Secret until after you book.
With hotels in many popular destinations, there’s sure to be something to tempt you with our amazing offers. Check out some of our suggestions to get you inspired.
Kensington Close Hotel & Spa from £85 Kensington Close Hotel & Spa from £85
Set moments from High Street Kensington in one of London’s most exclusive areas, the 4-star Kensington Close Hotel offers comfortable and stylish accommodation within easy reach of the centre of the city.
The smart modern rooms come equipped with a range of features, including air conditioning, paid wi-fi access, flatscreen TVs and private bathrooms.
Rejuvenate in the on-site health club and spa, before heading to the Boulevard Restaurant for a mouth-watering selection of European cuisine.
The Shaftesbury Metropolis London Hyde Park From £90 The Shaftesbury Metropolis London Hyde Park From £90
A 4-star hotel in the leafy area of Paddington, a couple of minutes from the station, the Shaftesbury Metropolis London Hyde Park is a former Victorian town house that's filled with a real sense of contemporary style.
The minimalist but colourful lobby is a cool spot to hang out and take advantage of the hotel's free wifi access, and there is a 24 hour reception desk and concierge service on-site.
A plasma TV can be found in every room, as well as a modern en suite bathroom.
Park Plaza Westminster Bridge London from £135 Park Plaza Westminster Bridge London from £135
A contemporary 4-star hotel on the South Bank , the Park Plaza Westminster Bridge London is just across the river from the iconic Big Ben and the Houses of Parliament.
Spoil yourself during your stay with a session at the Eastern-inspired Mandara Spa, and choose between Brasserie-style food at Joël, the cool Ichi Sushi Restaurant and Sashimi Bar, and the tempting treats at 1WB Patisserie and Lounge.
The hotel’s rooms have large LCD TVs, bathrooms with separate showers and tubs and free wifi.
